fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level mapping: dep calc 1 returns DeptID for each row as a calculated column.

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication of dep calc 1 and MarriedID; implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: dep calc 3
fixes.solution_explanation: Aggregation over dep calc 2 using SUM; implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
